abstract: HD Supply Holdings is planning an initial public offering that would value the entire company at about $4.3 billion, far less than the price paid by three private equity firms six years ago.
snippet: HD Supply Holdings is planning an initial public offering that would value the entire company at about $4.3 billion, far less than the price paid by three private equity firms six years ago.
lead_paragraph: The excesses of the buyout boom continue to haunt private equity firms, as the experience of HD Supply Holdings illustrates.

headline.main: With HD Supply I.P.O., a Reminder of the Buyout Boom
